SELECT count(*) FROM site s INNER JOIN firedevice f ON s.siteid = f.siteid INNER JOIN devicetype t ON t.iDeviceType = f.iDeviceType INNER JOIN firesystype ff ON t.tiSysType = ff.tiSysType WHERE s.orgid =#{orgid}
